participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.background: I'm not sure my height is relevant to the question. I have two kids I enjoy being on social media. I got hired last week at McDonald's. My favorite movie is Good Burger. I was able to make a delicious pie for my family even though my credit cards were maxed out.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous, carefree, and enthusiastic about life.
participant_2.background: I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery. I am a carefree, fun-loving, free-spirited person. I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend. I have glasses. My family members are all very supportive of my career as a teacher.

content.text: I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery.
Oh I like those too! My favorite is The Usual Suspects.
I have never seen that one. What's it about?
It's about a bunch of thieves who are caught up in a murder investigation. It's really good!
Sounds interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts. I'm going to one with my friend tomorrow night.
Oh that sounds fun! Who are you seeing?
Oh I love them! I saw them in concert a few years ago. They were amazing!
I'm so excited! I've heard they're great live.
They really are! You're going to have a great time.
Have you ever been to a concert before?
Yes, I've been to a few.
Oh good! Then you know what to expect.
Yeah, I'm just excited to see Twenty One Pilots.
Me too! I'm sure it will be a great show.
